name: pulse
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Generates a pulse sequence matrix for a given digital brain image.

inputs.description: 4D digital brain, resolution can be any.
inputs.name: Input digital brain file

inputs.description: Output base name
inputs.name: Output base name

inputs.description: Type of pulse sequence; default=epi (epi OR ge)
inputs.name: Pulse sequence

inputs.description: Flip angle in degrees; default=90
inputs.name: Flip angle

inputs.description: The time from the first RF to the first echo; default=0.03s
inputs.name: Echo time

inputs.description: The time between the two RF pulses applied on the same part of the object; default=3s
inputs.name: Repetition time

inputs.description: The time that takes for the acquisition of one slice; default=0.12s
inputs.name: Slice acquisition time

inputs.description: Resolution in x of the output image; default=64
inputs.name: X resolution

inputs.description: Resolution in y of the output image; default=64
inputs.name: Y resolution

inputs.description: Image voxel x-dimension; default=0.004m
inputs.name: Voxel x-dimension

inputs.description: Image voxel y-dimension; default=0.004m
inputs.name: Voxel y-dimension

inputs.description: Maximum gradient strength; default=0.055 T/m
inputs.name: Maximum gradient strength

inputs.description: Time it takes for the gradient to reach its max value; default=0.00022s
inputs.name: Gradient rise time

inputs.description: Receiving bandwidth; default=100000Hz
inputs.name: Receiving bandwidth

inputs.description: Number of volumes; default=1
inputs.name: Number of volumes

inputs.description: Number of slices; default=1
inputs.name: Number of slices

inputs.description: Slice thickness; default=0.006m
inputs.name: Slice thickness

inputs.description: Gap between the slices in meters; default=0m
inputs.name: Slice gap

inputs.description: The lowest position in the slice direction in meters; default=0m
inputs.name: Slice start position

inputs.description: Slice acquisition direction/orientation; default=z- (x+,x-, y+,y- or z+,or z-)
inputs.name: Slice acquisition direction

inputs.description: Phase encode direction/orientation; default=y+ (x+,x-, y+,y- or z+,or z-)
inputs.name: Phase encode direction

inputs.description: Read-out direction/orientation; default=x+ (x+,x-, y+,y- or z+,or z-)
inputs.name: Read-out direction

inputs.description: Switch on diagnostic messages
inputs.name: Verbose Flag

inputs.description: Save k-space coordinates; default=no
inputs.name: K-space coordinates flag

inputs.description: Phase partial Fourier coverage in percentage; default=100 (min=50, max=100)
inputs.name: Fourier coverage
